Needed NPCs

Tal'Anee

Far'Maen

Mayor

  • modeling concept
  • dialog
    • main manager of Far'Maen reputation
    • source of quests
  • stationary
  • low combat

Head of Malitia

  • modeling (concept [1] [2] [3] [4])
  • dialog
    • source of quests
    • source of training weapons.
    • rewards for killing bandits
  • wanders town
  • guard-level combat

Innkeeper

  • modeling (really, anything that doesn't look like a goon)
  • dialog
    • generic help
    • possible quest(s), or at least directions.
  • some trading
  • wanders bar.
  • low level combat

General Store Owner

  • modeling (really, anything that doesn't look like a goon)
  • dialog
    • trader
  • wanders store.
  • low level combat

Smith

  • modeling (really, anything that doesn't look like a goon)
  • dialog
    • trader
    • possible quest(s)
  • wanders smithy.
  • moderate combat

Por'Taem

Merchants

  • modeling (really, anything that doesn't look like a goon)
  • dialog
    • trader
  • wanders store.
  • low level combat

Guard/Guard Captain

  • Modeling
  • dialog
    • source of quests
    • source of training weapons.
    • rewards for killing bandits
    • main manager of Por'Taem reputation.
  • wanders town
  • guard-level combat

Priest

  • modeling (concept [5] [6] [7])
  • dialog
    • source of quests
  • stationary
  • low combat

Other

Farmers

  • modeling (pesantwear)
  • dialog
    • possible quest(s)
    • some directions
    • sparse trading
  • stationary.
  • low/no combat

Bandits

  • Modeling; (pesantwear plus)
  • dialog
    • varies.
  • both wanderers and stationary...
  • variable combat.

wild animals

Modeling...

  • wolf
  • dog
  • deer
  • rabbit
